Points.Text: We'll automatically apply your points Balance to eligible orders when you checkout. See the KMC Points terms and conditions for further information. Points Balance

Home.text: Shop for our most frequently bought products!
Home.cookies: By using our website, you agree to our cookie policy
Home.points_dis: choose the amount of point to use for your discount
Home.category: Top of the range dental tools, materials and devices. Search through our range to find the high quality supplies that you need.
Home.About_us: KMC is a well-established Egyptian medical company that specialises in dental supplies. They have expanded their operations all over Egypt covering Heliopolis, El Manial, Alexandria, Nasr City, El Qasr El Ainy and has made connections with multinational companies to introduce high range brands to the Egyptian market
Home.About_us_2: Kandil Medical Company was founded in 1989 by Dr. Waleed Kandil and he strived in achieving the company mission to continuously supply the newest and updated dentistry technology that serves the Egyptian market in the most professional and effective way possible. 5. Educate yourself with our interesting articles and tips all about dental hygiene and much more.

If you provide any information that is untrue, inaccurate, or incomplete, we have the right to suspend or terminate your account and refuse any and all current or future use of the site.
Terms.p6: You may not access or use the site for any purpose other than that for which we make the site available. The Site may not be used in connection with any commercial endeavors except those that are specifically endorsed or approved by us. As a user of the Site, you agree not to:
Terms.p7: Trick, defraud, or mislead us and other users, especially in any attempt to learn sensitive account information such as user passwords.

Terms.p9: Attempt to impersonate another user or person or use the userame of another user. Harass, annoy, intimidate, or threaten any of our employees or agents engaged in providing any portion of the site to you

Terms.p11: Make any unauthorized use of the site, including collecting userames and/or email addresses of users by electronic or other means for the purpose of sending unsolicited email, or creating user accounts by automated means or under false pretenses.
Terms.p12: Use the site as part of any effort to compete with us
Terms.p13: We may provide you areas on the site to leave reviews or ratings. When posting a review, you must comply with the following criteria: (1) you should have firsthand experience with the person/entity being reviewed; (2) your reviews should not contain offensive profanity, or abusive, racist, offensive, or hate language; (3) your reviews should not contain discriminatory references based on religion, race, gender, national origin, age, marital status, sexual orientation, or disability; (4) your reviews should not contain references to illegal activity, (5) you should not be affiliated with competitors if posting negative reviews; (6) you should not make any conclusions as to the legality of conduct; (7) you may not post any false or misleading statements.   We may accept, rejector remove reviews in our sole discretion. We have absolutely no obligation to screen reviews or to delete reviews, even if anyone considers reviews objectionable or inaccurate. We do not assume liability for any review or for any claims,liabilities, or losses resulting from any review.
Terms.p14: We reserve the right, but not the obligation, to: (1) monitor the site for violations of these Terms of Use; (2) take appropriate legal action against anyone who, in our sole discretion, violates the law or these Terms of Use, including without limitation, reporting such user to law enforcement authorities; (3) in our sole discretion and without limitation, refuse, restrict access to, limit the availability of, or disable (to the extent technologically feasible) any of your Contributions or any portion thereof; (4) in our sole discretion and without limitation, notice, or liability, to remove from the site or otherwise disable all files and content that are excessive in size or are in any way burdensome to our systems; and (5) otherwise manage the site in a manner designed to protect our rights and property and to facilitate the proper functioning of the site.

Privacy.p2: describes the ways in which your data is collected, as well as, how and why we may process your information. Please read the following.
Privacy.p3: Personal information is gathered upon use and navigation on the website although sensitive information is not accessed.
Privacy.p4: Information collected excludes revealing your specific identity (name or contact information) although may include device usage information as well as location, IP adress information about how and when you use our services and other technical information. This is used mainly for maintain security and operation of the website and internal analytics and reporting.
Privacy.p5: Personal information is shared with buisiness transfers, affiliations and business partners.
Privacy.p6: We may uses tracking technologies like cookies to collect and store information
Privacy.p7: Information is kept for as long as needed for purposes set in this privacy policy. When there is no legitimate business need to store your information, it will either be deleted or anonymized. If it not possible because information has been stored in archived, then information will be held securely.
Privacy.p8: Account may be reviewed, changed or terminated at anytime.
Privacy.p9: You have the right to use the “do not track” feature to not have your online data collected.
Privacy.p10: You have the right to access personal information collected from you, change or delete it.
Privacy.p11: With the exception of situations where a product is fake, defective, or materially different from what the customer ordered, products sold on the website are subject to a 14 (fourteen) calendar day return policy as long as they are in their original packaging and condition when purchased and received
Privacy.p12: Upon arrangement through KMC’s customer support team, there will be a courier pickup and return to ensure a full refund is given to the customer and vendor must accept refund. In the case that these conditions are satisfied, KMC will not charge any penalty costs.
Privacy.p13: Shipping charges wil be placed on vendors in the event if products returned are due to a breach of these terms. Returned products will be held in the custody of KMC for 60 days from days of receipt if there has been at least two attempts and products are not accepted. After then, the vendor will have no further claims to the items' fees, revenues, or pricing, and KMC will be free to destroy the products as it sees fit.
